description:
Popular model Akemi follows her horoscope by making bodyguard Ryo Saeba her fiance.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Das Model und der Killer - Teil 1
Ryo`s Her Future Husband?! Her Horoscope Says She`ll Meet and Marry Him! (Part One)
Ryou wa Iinazuke!? Deatte Koishite Uranaimasu! (Zenpen)
獠は許嫁!? 出会って恋して占います! (前編)
